resources.name: user
resources.description: Todo lo relacionado a los usuarios de la app

resources.contents:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  description: "Plataforma para la administración mantenciones. Proyecto de Ing. de Software"
  version: 1.0.0
  title: maintenance
  contact:
    email: "jose.benavente2001@alumnos.ubiobio.cl"
servers:
  - url: https://localhost:3000/api
tags:
  - name: company
    description: Todo acerca de las empresas
  - name: maintenance
    description: Todas las mantenciones
  - name: user
    description: Todo lo relacionado a los usuarios de la app
paths:
  "/company/":
    post:
      tags:
        - company
      summary: Crear empresa
      description: "Crear una empresa"
      operationId: createCompany
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
        "400":
          description: Could not create company
  "/company/{id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - company
      summary: Obtener empresa
      description: "Obtener empresa a partir de su ID."
      operationId: getCompanyById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
    patch:
      tags:
        - company
      summary: Actualizar empresa
      description: "Actualizar una empresa a partir de su ID."
      operationId: updateCompany
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
    delete:
      tags:
        - company
      summary: Eliminar empresa
      description: "Eliminar una empresa a partir de su ID."
      operationId: deleteCompany
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Company"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
  "/maintenance/":
    post:
      tags:
        - maintenance
      summary: Crear mantención
      description: "Crear una mantención"
      operationId: createMaintenance
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
        "400":
          description: Could not create maintenance
  "/maintenance/{id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - maintenance
      summary: Obtener mantención
      description: "Obtener mantenimiento a partir de su ID."
      operationId: getMaintenanceById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
    patch:
      tags:
        - maintenance
      summary: Actualizar mantención
      description: "Actualizar un mantenimineto a partir de su ID."
      operationId: updateMaintenance
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
    delete:
      tags:
        - maintenance
      summary: Eliminar mantención
      description: "Eliminar un mantenimineto a partir de su ID."
      operationId: deleteMaintenance
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Maintenance"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
  "/user/":
    post:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Crear usuario
      description: "Crear un usuario."
      operationId: createUser
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          description: Could not create user
  "/user/{id}":
    get:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Obtener usuario
      description: "Obtener usuario a partir de su ID."
      operationId: getUserById
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
    patch:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Actualizar usuario
      description: "Actualizar un usuario mediante ID."
      operationId: updateUser
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: "The id that needs to be fetched."
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Successful operation
          content:
            application/xml:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/User"
        "400":
          description: Invalid id supplied
    delete:
      tags:
        - user
      summary: Eliminar usuario
      description: Esto puede realizarse por un administrador.
      operationId: deleteUser
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: El id del usuario a eliminar
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "400":
          description: Invalid username supplied
components:
  schemas:
    Company:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
        rut:
          type: string
        area:
          type: string
        phone:
          type: string
        address:
          type: string
        contact:
          type: string
    User:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
        email:
          type: string
        admin:
          type: boolean
        company:
          type: boolean
    Maintenance:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        company:
          type: object
          properties:
            id:
              type: integer
              format: int64
        target:
          type: string
        type:
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        start_date:
          type: string
        end_date:
          type: string
        registry:
          anyOf:
            - type: string
            - type: array
              items:
                type: string
